name: immersive-realtime-website
description: A fully immersive real-time website with admin panel and chat functionality

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function copyDir(src, dest) { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); const entries = fs.readdirSync(src, { withFileTypes: true }); for (let entry of entries) { const srcPath = path.join(src, entry.name); const destPath = path.join(dest, entry.name); if (entry.isDirectory()) { copyDir(srcPath, destPath); } else { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); } } }; if (!fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.mkdirSync('dist'); const files = fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f => f.endsWith('.html') || f.endsWith('.css') || f.endsWith('.js') || f.endsWith('.toml')); files.forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(f, path.join('dist', f))); if (fs.existsSync('netlify')) copyDir('netlify', path.join('dist', 'netlify')); console.log('Build complete - dist directory created');"

author: Your Name
